review: I have been taking it for 2 1/2 years now for both PsA and psoriasis. Before Remicade I was on Humira and still had about 25-30 percent plaque coverage mostly on my legs and arms. about a week after the first infusion my Psoriasis was almost cleared up. I now only have a tiny bit starting in my ears again, the only side effect I attribute to it is my blood pressure skyrocketed shortly after the first infusion, however, it is under good control with a low dose of Coversyl plus. I hope to remain on Remicade for a long time. My arthritis seems to under control with only minor flares just before infusion.
Been getting Remicade every six weeks for around 20 years.  Went from almost full body psoriasis to just a couple patches.  Miracle drug for me.

It only partially worked after four months of use and then completely stopped working after fourteen month's after starting. However, then again, I've only had one TNF inhibitor worked well after six months of use and for next twelve months before it stopped working. I've tried five different TNF inhibitors and one other
Relieves about 90% of scaling and itch.
Remicade has worked extremely well for me,it has given me my life back.It truly has been my miracle drug.
